refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the note number of the current MIDI event and modify it by the current pitch-bend value, express it in pitch-class units.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Get the note number of the current MIDI event and modify it by the current pitch-bend value, express it in pitch-class units.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: irange (optional) -- the pitch bend range in semitones

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Get the note number of the current MIDI event, modify it by the current pitch-bend value, and express the result in pitch-class units. Available as an i-time value or as a continuous k-rate value.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
